item.description:
UPDATE, 11 A.M. THE MEETUP IS ON. SEE YOU IN NATICK! I'll be there about 11:45.

Welcome to our first Meetup of 2012.  Mark your calendars (and RSVP) now!

Swap themes:

#1: Writing on the wall (interpret any way you like).

#2: Make cards using items from December holiday gift-bag swap. If you didn't participate in the gift-bag swap, please participate in Swap #1 instead.

#3: Late addition: Artist's choice swap! Same as always: Bring 4 cards, get back 3 (including some from the Georgia Peaches).

Activity/Demo: Tam will do a demo of some super easy, effortless techniques for distress inks. If you have any of these items, please bring them:

--Non-Stick Craft Sheet

--Distress ink pads

--"Mister" spray bottles (mini ones are best)

--Craft irons 

--Heat Guns

--Ink Blending Tool (most of you know this as the blending tool used with alcohol inks)

--Stamps (I think Medium to Large stamps will work best)

I will be providing some tags to play with but if you have any scrap papers that you would like to possibly turn into backgrounds this could be a good technique for that.

Please do not go out and buy these items - there should be enough to 'go around' as long as people are comfortable sharing what they already have. We have some items coming from the studio as well my own supply to use. 

And if you're not familiar with distress inks, you can learn a bit more here: http://www.rangerink.com/pcbfall10.htm
item.how_to_find_us: Church Fellowship Hall--enter through door at back of parking lot

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ Monthly Meetup in Natick for January 2012
